title: Is Trump a threat to the rule of law?
itunes:title: Is Trump a threat to the rule of law?
description: The president has gone after the FBI, judges and the First Amendment. But so far his vendetta against so-called sanctuary cities has failed and his attorney general won't start an investigation against Hillary Clinton. Will he spark a Constitutional standoff with the special counsel?  Is the GOP forfeiting its claim to be the party of law and order?
itunes:summary: The president has gone after the FBI, judges and the First Amendment. But so far his vendetta against so-called sanctuary cities has failed and his attorney general won't start an investigation against Hillary Clinton. Will he spark a Constitutional standoff with the special counsel? Is the GOP forfeiting its claim to be the party of law and order?

author: webmaster@kcrw.org (KCRW)
itunes:author: KCRW
itunes:keywords: sexual harassment,Roy Moore,Al Franken,partisan politics,rule of law,misinformation,obstruction of justice,Mueller investigation,impeachment,abuse of power,tax bill,alternate minimum tax,Jerusalem
